meta.description: Language file for pubdb template settings

languageKey.label: CrossRef registrant:Set your CrossRef registrant ID here.
CrossRef depositor:Set the name of the CrossRef depositor here.
CrossRef depositor email:Set the email address of the CrossRef depositor here.
URL for DOI:Define the URL where DOIs shall point to (e.g. http://anywhere.com/pulications/doi/)
